name: ARPAN SEVA SANSTHAN

address: First Floor, Shri Shyam Baba Apartments
Plot No. 209, Rani Sati Nagar, Vishwakarma Marg

briefDescription: Arpan Seva Sansthan was brought into existence on 29th March 1996 with the purpose of ensuring access of community to secured livelihood opportunities. It is our vision to implement sustainable programs that improve the livelihoods of rural community. Our mission is to promote processes which are sustainable, socially inclusive and equitable to enable critical masses of poor and marginalized rural people or communities to achieve a dignified quality of life. We work in sector of Natural Resource Management, Watershed Development, Environment Protection, Livelihood Enhancement (Farm and Non Farm), Skill Development, Drinking Water & Sanitation. We have benefited more than 15 lakhs community members through our development interventions.

address: 7, Meera Nagar - B, Behind Skyheight Complex
